goal.en: This course introduces the fundamental considerations of seismic design for structures in Taiwan. The students will understand the concept of design civil structure after taking this course.
goal.ch: 介紹建築物耐震、隔減震設計之基本概念與原理，讓學生修習完此課程後，對於結構耐震設計、隔減震設計有相關之基本概念。

content.en:
1.Structural Dynamics
2.Earthquake Response Spectrum
3.Taiwan Seismic design codes
4.Seismic-resistant design of buildings
5.Seismic isolation and energy-dissipation design of buildings
6.Introduction of structural analysis program ETABS
content.ch:
1.結構動力
2.地震反應譜
3.台灣建築物耐震設計規範
4.建築物耐震設計
5.建築物隔減震設計
6.結構分析程式ETABS介紹

textbook.en: 1.Seismic Design Code, Taiwan Ministry of the Interior Construction and Planning Agency. 2.Dynamics of Structures – Theory and Application to Earthquake Engineering, Anil K. Chopra, 5th Ed., Prentice-Hall.“
textbook.ch: “1.建築物耐震設計規範與解說，內政部營建署，(中華民國一百十一年十月一日生效) 2.Dynamics of Structures – Theory and Application to Earthquake Engineering, Anil K. Chopra, 5th Ed., Prentice-Hall.“
